section.name: Overview
section.p: OpenEdge Velocity String resources is a Velocity Resource loader that works with Strings. You can use this for formatting e-mails etc. Users should manualy add resources to the repository that is know by the factory of this package.
Below is an example configuration for this loader. Note that 'repositoryimpl' is not mandatory; if not provided, the factory will fall back on using the default implementation of this package.
